Reviews.Title: WG-1NOT WATERPROOF!!!
Reviews.Author: sderock
Reviews.Content: The WG-1 as rugged as it may appear, and despite being branded as waterproof to 33ft., quite simply is not! I received my WG-1 and gave it a detailed inspection. The fit and finish on all the controls and screen seemed very nice, but the access door for the battery/memory card seemed quite flimsy. It has a soft rubber seal that appears to be adequate.. but beware. I tested my WG-1 by submerging it wile taking video in my swimming pool. I slowly dipped below the waterline and held the camera at various angles. Once the camera was about 2ft deep, the functions locked up. Unfortunately, this will require sending it back to Pentax for inspection/ repair. Huge hustle to say the least.

Reviews.Title: Great adventure camera
Reviews.Author: Drone
Reviews.Content: When I first started using the camera the colors appeared washed out compared to my previous Cannon digital camera.  Once I switched from using the auto mode and instead used 'P' mode the picture quality improved immensely.  I have used the camera for snorkeling in Maui, 4wheeling in the outdoors and as a general camera around town.  The only issues is the lack of image stabilization, which you get in the Cannon digital waterproof camera, the shutter speed could be a bit faster and it's not the greatest at taking pictures at night.  But the slimmer profile and solid container more then makes up for it.I did have issues with the stock digital battery in the heat down in New Orleans.  It would cause the digital screen to fade to white, at first I thought it was a problem with the screen itself which is a known issue with the Pentax digital cameras.  But switching to the back-up battery resolved the issue.  Out of everything included in this kit I mainly use the extra battery... and that is about it.  The mini tripod is cool but I have not been in a situation where it would actually be useful.But the camera does exactly what I want it to do.  Be able to be dropped, dust proof, water proof and fits in a pocket.
